component.name: DS3231 Real Time Clock
component.purpose: It keeps track of the current time in any electronic device that needs to keep accurate time.

properties.property: Back-up Power Supply Input from Battery

component.description: Real Time Clock or RTC is a timekeeping device in the form of an Integrated Circuit or IC. RTC is an integral component of many time critical applications and devices like Servers, GPS, Data Loggers etc.
